00054     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00055     /// @class PhysMotionState
00056     /// @headerfile physactor.h
00057     /// @brief This class is used by the actor class to sync between the physics world and the graphical world.
00058     /// @details This class provides the link for position and orientation between the two worlds in the engine.
00059     /// This is called on every step(frame) of the world to sync the actor if it has moved.
00060     ///////////////////////////////////////
00061 
00062     class PhysMotionState : public btMotionState {
00063         private:
00064             friend class ActorBase;
00065             Ogre::SceneNode* snode;
00066             btTransform initposition;
00067 
00068         public:
00069             /// @brief Blank Constructor.
00070             /// @details Basic no-initialization constructor.
00071             PhysMotionState();
00072             /// @brief Constructor.
00073             /// @details The class constructor.
00074             /// @param Scenenode The scenenode belonging to the actor.
00075             PhysMotionState(Ogre::SceneNode* scenenode);
00076             /// @brief Destructor.
00077             /// @details The class destructor.
00078             virtual ~PhysMotionState();
00079             /// @brief Sets the scenenode.
00080             /// @details Sets the scenenode to be sync'd every step.
00081             /// @param Scenenode The scenenode belonging to the actor.
00082             void SetNode(Ogre::SceneNode* scenenode);
00083             /// @brief Sets the initial position.
00084             /// @details Sets the position the actor will be placed in when it is added to the world.
00085             /// This function is called on by the ActorBase function SetInitPosition().
00086             /// @param Position The vector3 representing the location to be used.
00087             void SetPosition(PhysVector3 position);
00088             /// @brief Sets the initial orientation.
00089             /// @details Sets the orientation the actor will have when it is added to the world.
00090             /// This function is called on by the ActorBase function SetInitOrientation().
00091             /// @param Orientation The vector3 representing the orientation to be used.
00092             void SetOrientation(Quaternion orientation);
00093 
00094             /// @brief Sets the initial position.
00095             /// @details This function is called on by the physics world upon adding the actor to the world.
00096             /// This function uses the previous set vector3 that was set with SetInitPosition(). @n
00097             /// Default position is (0,0,0).
00098             /// @param WorldTrans The location and orientation data.
00099             virtual void getWorldTransform(btTransform &worldTrans) const;
00100             /// @brief Updates the position and orientation.
00101             /// @details This function is called each step(frame) by the physics world to sync the physics and graphical worlds.
00102             /// @param WorldTrans The location and orientation data.
00103             virtual void setWorldTransform(const btTransform &worldTrans);
00104     };
00105

00109     ActorBase::ActorBase (String name, String file, String group, World* _World)
00110     {
00111         this->GameWorld = _World;
00112         this->node = this->GameWorld->OgreSceneManager->createSceneNode();
00113         this->GameWorld->OgreSceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->addChild(this->node);
00114         this->MotionState = new PhysMotionState(this->node);
00115         this->Shape = new btEmptyShape();
00116         this->CreateEntity(name, file, group);
00117     }
00118 
00119     ActorBase::~ActorBase ()
00120     {
00121         delete MotionState;
00122         delete Shape;
00123     }

00125     ///////////////////////////////////
00126     // ActorBase Private misc functions
00127 
00128     btTriangleMesh* ActorBase::CreateTrimesh()
00129     {
00130         // Get the mesh from the entity
00131         Ogre::MeshPtr myMesh = entity->getMesh();
00132 
00133         // Get the submesh and associated data
00134         Ogre::SubMesh* subMesh = myMesh->getSubMesh(0);
00135         Ogre::IndexData*  indexData = subMesh->indexData;
00136         Ogre::VertexData* vertexData = subMesh->vertexData;
00137 
00138         // Get the position element
00139         const Ogre::VertexElement* posElem = vertexData->vertexDeclaration->findElementBySemantic(Ogre::VES_POSITION);
00140 
00141         // Get a pointer to the vertex buffer
00142         Ogre::HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr vBuffer = vertexData->vertexBufferBinding->getBuffer(posElem->getSource());
00143 
00144         // Get a pointer to the index buffer
00145         Ogre::HardwareIndexBufferSharedPtr iBuffer = indexData->indexBuffer;
00146 
00147         // Get the number of triangles
00148         unsigned int triCount = indexData->indexCount/3;
00149 
00150         // Allocate space for the vertices and indices
00151         Ogre::Vector3* vertices = new Ogre::Vector3[vertexData->vertexCount];
00152         unsigned long* indices  = new unsigned long[indexData->indexCount];
00153 
00154         // Lock the vertex buffer (READ ONLY)
00155         unsigned char* vertex =   static_cast<unsigned char*>(vBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00156         float* pReal = NULL;
00157         for (size_t j = 0; j < vertexData->vertexCount; ++j, vertex += vBuffer->getVertexSize() )
00158         {
00159             posElem->baseVertexPointerToElement(vertex, &pReal);
00160             Ogre::Vector3 pt(pReal[0], pReal[1], pReal[2]);
00161             vertices[j] = pt;
00162         }
00163         vBuffer->unlock();
00164         size_t index_offset = 0;
00165         bool use32bitindexes = (iBuffer->getType() == Ogre::HardwareIndexBuffer::IT_32BIT);
00166 
00167         // Lock the index buffer (READ ONLY)
00168         unsigned long* pLong = static_cast<unsigned long*>(iBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00169         unsigned short* pShort = reinterpret_cast<unsigned short*>(pLong);
00170 
00171         if (use32bitindexes)
00172         {
00173             for (size_t k = 0; k < triCount*3; ++k)
00174             {
00175                 indices[index_offset++] = pLong[k];
00176             }
00177         }
00178         else
00179         {
00180             for (size_t k = 0; k < triCount*3; ++k)
00181             {
00182                 indices[index_offset++] = static_cast<unsigned long>(pShort[k]);
00183             }
00184         }
00185         iBuffer->unlock();
00186 
00187         // We now have vertices and indices ready to go
00188 
00189         // The Bullet triangle mesh
00190         btTriangleMesh* trimesh = new btTriangleMesh(use32bitindexes);
00191 
00192         // Setup the tri mesh
00193         btVector3 vert0, vert1, vert2;
00194         int i=0;
00195 
00196         // For every triangle
00197         for (unsigned int y=0; y<triCount; y++)
00198         {
00199             // Set each vertex
00200             vert0.setValue(vertices[indices[i]].x, vertices[indices[i]].y, vertices[indices[i]].z);
00201             vert1.setValue(vertices[indices[i+1]].x, vertices[indices[i+1]].y, vertices[indices[i+1]].z);
00202             vert2.setValue(vertices[indices[i+2]].x, vertices[indices[i+2]].y, vertices[indices[i+2]].z);
00203 
00204             // Add it into the trimesh
00205             trimesh->addTriangle(vert0, vert1, vert2);
00206 
00207             // Increase index count
00208             i+=3;
00209         }
00210         delete[] vertices;
00211         delete[] indices;
00212 
00213         return trimesh;
00214     }

00233     {

00237     PhysVector3 ActorBase::GetOgreLocation()
00238     {
00239         PhysVector3 temp;
00240         temp.ExtractOgreVector3(this->node->getPosition());
00241         return temp;
00242     }
00243 
00244     void ActorBase::SetBulletLocation (PhysVector3 Location)
00245     {
00246         //btTransform* temp = this->CollisionObject->getWorldTransform();
00247         this->CollisionObject->getWorldTransform().setOrigin(Location.GetBulletVector3());
00248     }
00249 
00250     PhysVector3 ActorBase::GetBulletLocation()
00251     {
00252         PhysVector3 temp;
00253         btTransform trans = this->CollisionObject->getWorldTransform();
00254         temp.ExtractBulletVector3(trans.getOrigin());
00255         return temp;
00256     }

00270     }

00320     void ActorBase::AttachToGraphics ()
00321     {
00322         PhysVector3 temp;
00323         //temp.ExtractBulletVector3(this->MotionState->initposition.getOrigin());
00324         temp = GetBulletLocation();
00325         this->node->setPosition(temp.GetOgreVector3());
00326         this->node->attachObject(this->entity);
00327     }

00357     void ActorRigid::CreateRigidObject (Real pmass)
00358     {
00359         btScalar bmass=pmass;
00360         this->physrigidbody = new btRigidBody (bmass, this->MotionState, this->Shape);
00361         CollisionObject=physrigidbody;
00362     }

00364     void ActorRigid::AddObjectToWorld (World *TargetWorld, btSoftRigidDynamicsWorld* btWorld)
00365     {
00366         btWorld->addRigidBody(this->physrigidbody);
00367         AttachToGraphics();
00368     }
00369 
00370     void ActorRigid::CreateShapeFromMeshDynamic(short unsigned int accuracy)
00371     {
00372         if(accuracy==1)
00373         {
00374             delete Shape;
00375             /// @todo - Check for thread safety
00376             btConvexShape *tmpshape = new btConvexTriangleMeshShape(this->CreateTrimesh());
00377             btShapeHull *hull = new btShapeHull(tmpshape);
00378             btScalar margin = tmpshape->getMargin();
00379             hull->buildHull(margin);
00380             tmpshape->setUserPointer(hull);
00381             btConvexHullShape* convexShape = new btConvexHullShape();
00382             for (int b=0;b<hull->numVertices();b++)
00383             {
00384                 convexShape->addPoint(hull->getVertexPointer()[b]);
00385             }
00386             delete tmpshape;
00387             delete hull;
00388             btScalar mass=this->physrigidbody->getInvMass();
00389             mass=1/mass;
00390             btVector3 inertia(0,0,0);
00391             convexShape->calculateLocalInertia(mass, inertia);
00392             Shape = convexShape;
00393             this->Shape->setLocalScaling(btVector3(0.95,0.95,0.95));
00394             this->physrigidbody->setCollisionShape(this->Shape);
00395             this->physrigidbody->setMassProps(mass,inertia);
00396             return;
00397         }
00398         if(accuracy==2)
00399         {
00400             delete Shape;
00401             /// @todo add code here to increase the verticies that is used to create the hull from the first accuracy setting.
00402             btConvexShape *tmpshape = new btConvexTriangleMeshShape(this->CreateTrimesh());
00403             Shape=tmpshape;
00404             this->physrigidbody->setCollisionShape(this->Shape);
00405             return;
00406         }
00407         if(accuracy==3)
00408         {
00409             delete Shape;
00410             /// @todo add code here for compound shapes of convex hulls
00411             this->physrigidbody->setCollisionShape(this->Shape);
00412             return;
00413         }
00414         if(accuracy==4)
00415         {
00416             delete Shape;
00417             btGImpactMeshShape* gimpact = new btGImpactMeshShape(this->CreateTrimesh());
00418             btScalar mass=this->physrigidbody->getInvMass();
00419             mass=1/mass;
00420             btVector3 inertia(0,0,0);
00421             gimpact->calculateLocalInertia(mass, inertia);
00422             gimpact->setLocalScaling(btVector3(1.f,1.f,1.f));
00423             gimpact->setMargin(0.04);
00424             gimpact->updateBound();
00425             Shape=gimpact;
00426             this->physrigidbody->setCollisionShape(this->Shape);
00427             this->physrigidbody->setMassProps(mass,inertia);
00428             return;
00429         }
00430         return;
00431     }
00432 
00433     void ActorRigid::CreateShapeFromMeshStatic()
00434     {
00435         delete Shape;
00436 
00437         /// @todo - Check for thread safety
00438         btBvhTriangleMeshShape *tmpshape = new btBvhTriangleMeshShape(this->CreateTrimesh(),true);
00439         this->Shape=tmpshape;
00440         this->Shape->setLocalScaling(btVector3(0.95,0.95,0.95));
00441         this->physrigidbody->setCollisionShape(this->Shape);
00442     }
00443 
00444     void ActorRigid::LimitMovementOnAxis(bool x, bool y, bool z)
00445     {
00446         btVector3 LinFact(x,y,z);
00447         this->physrigidbody->setLinearFactor(LinFact);
00448         return;
00449     }

00483     PhysMotionState::PhysMotionState()
00484     {
00485         this->initposition.setIdentity();
00486     }
00487 
00488     PhysMotionState::PhysMotionState(Ogre::SceneNode* scenenode)
00489     {
00490         this->snode=scenenode;
00491         this->initposition.setIdentity();
00492     }
00493 
00494     PhysMotionState::~PhysMotionState()
00495     {
00496         if (snode!=NULL)
00497         {
00498             delete snode;
00499         }
00500     }
00501 
00502     void PhysMotionState::SetNode(Ogre::SceneNode* scenenode)
00503     {
00504         this->snode=scenenode;
00505     }
00506 
00507     void PhysMotionState::SetPosition(PhysVector3 position)
00508     {
00509         this->initposition.setOrigin(position.GetBulletVector3());
00510     }
00511 
00512     void PhysMotionState::SetOrientation(Quaternion orientation)
00513     {
00514         this->initposition.setRotation(orientation.GetBulletQuaternion());
00515     }
00516 
00517     void PhysMotionState::getWorldTransform(btTransform &worldTrans) const
00518     {
00519         worldTrans=initposition;
00520     }
00521 
00522     void PhysMotionState::setWorldTransform(const btTransform &worldTrans)
00523     {
00524         btQuaternion rotation = worldTrans.getRotation();
00525         this->snode->setOrientation(rotation.w(), rotation.x(), rotation.y(), rotation.z());
00526         btVector3 position = worldTrans.getOrigin();
00527         this->snode->setPosition(position.x(), position.y(), position.z());
00528     }
